div.p: My friendly greetings with the offering of all honors, love, and goods beforehand, especially to my gracious, honorable, dear lord and good friend. As I have learned that your wine in Zurich has not turned out well in all respects, I hereby send you a small barrel of my produce from Rolle. Please receive it and keep a third part for yourself, and let the remaining two parts be given to my gracious lords Zwingli, Lavater, Haller, and Lord JÃ¶rg Grebel, and that for a good, fortunate, new year. I hereby request to show you, as my especially gracious, dear lord, love and service according to my ability, and hereby commend you faithfully to God Almighty.
From Bern, December 9, 1568. Your entirely well-wishing Johann Steiger [wrote].
To the highly learned, pious, honorable, and wise lord Heinrich Bullinger, leader of the divine word in Zurich, my gracious lord and good friend. Zurich.
